description:
Created to celebrate the franchise`s fifteenth anniversary, Mobile Fighter G Gundam was Gundam`s first foray into alternate universes.
In the year Future Century 60, most humans have left the polluted Earth behind and moved into space. To prevent war, the colonies have agreed on a Gundam Fight to decide control of the colonies for four years at a time.
This year, http://anidb.net/ch53504 [Neo Japan]`s http://anidb.net/ch12099 [Domon Kasshu], the King of Hearts, hopes to win with his http://anidb.net/ch53498 [Shining Gundam], but he hasn`t come to Earth simply to win the Gundam Fight. His concurrent mission is to track down and destroy the http://anidb.net/ch53503 [Devil Gundam] which has escaped from Neo Japan and threatens to destroy the entire planet.

REGULAR.description:
As the Gundam Fight is about to begin, Domon Kasshu, the Gundam Fighter of Neo Japan, arrives on Earth after his Shining Gundam has unexpectedly veered off course and crashes in Rome.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Gundam Fight beginnt! Der Gundam, der auf die Erde fiel
G(ガンダム)ファイト開始! 地球に落ちたガンダム
Gundam Fight Kaishi! Chikyuu ni Ochita Gundam
Que le Gundam Fight commence ! Le Gundam tombé sur Terre
The Gundam Fight Begins! The Gundam that Fell to Earth

REGULAR.description:
As New York City is abuzz about Chibodee Crocket, the Gundam Fighter of Neo America, and his Gundam Maxter, Domon appears during a boxing match to challenge Chibodee to a Gundam Fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Coup de tonnerre ! Le rêve à portée de poing
Das Brüllen des Siegtreffers
Roar of the Winning Punch
Unare! Yume o Tsukanda Hissatsu Punch
唸れ! 夢を掴んだ必殺パンチ

REGULAR.description:
As Domon travels to Neo China, he is approached by two Shaolin monks who urge him to take on the Gundam Fighter of Neo China, who has apparently gone rogue.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beat the Dragon Gundam
Den Dragon Gundam gilt es zu schlagen
Que justice soit faite ! Le maléfique Dragon Gundam
Taose! Majin Dragon Gundam
倒せ! 魔神ドラゴンガンダム

REGULAR.description:
In his eagerness, Domon interrupts a fight between Neo France`s representative, George de Sand, and another opponent, but George, disgusted at this cavalier attitude, refuses to accept the challenge.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Challenge! The Red Rose Knight
Herausforderung! Der Ritter der roten Rosen
Iza Shoubu! Shinku no Bara no Kikoushi
Un combat d’homme à homme ! Le prince à la rose rouge
いざ勝負! 真紅のバラの貴公子

REGULAR.description:
In Neo Russia, Domon has gone after the country`s Gundam Fighter, but he is arrested by the local police and thrown into a large prison.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Daidassou! Toraware no Gundam Fighter
Die große Flucht! Ein inhaftierter Gundam Fighter
Great Escape! A Captive Gundam Fighter
La grande évasion ! Le Gundam Fighter prisonnier
大脱走! 囚われのガンダムファイター

REGULAR.description:
Domon returns to the Neo Japan space colony. There he undergoes a virtual reality simulation to determine if he is the right choice for Neo Japan`s Gundam Fighter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bats-toi, Domon ! Le ring, c’est la Terre !
Fight, Domon! Earth is the Ring
Kämpfe, Domon! Die Erde ist der Ring!
Tatakae Domon! Chikyuu ga Ring Da
闘えドモン! 地球がリングだ

REGULAR.description:
Domon goes to Neo Mexico in order to fight the Gundam Fighter, Chico Rodriguez, but upon arrival he learns that the fighter has run away and is being hunted by the local authorities.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kuru Nara Koi! Hisshi no Toubousha
Mach dich kampfbereit! Ein verzweifelter Flüchtling
Prepare to Fight! Desperate Fugitive
Une vie dans l’impasse ! Le Gundam Fighter désespéré
来るなら来い! 必死の逃亡者

REGULAR.description:
Domon travels to Neo Canada to fight Andrew Graham and his Lumber Gundam, but Andrew refuses, and he is defeated unofficially, as no official match takes place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ada wa Utsu! Fukushuu no Uchuu Keiji
An Old Grudge: Revenge of the Space Police
Ein alter Groll! Die Rache der Weltraumpolizei
L’heure de la vengeance ! La rancœur du policier spatial
仇は討つ! 復讐の宇宙刑事

REGULAR.description:
Domon tries to defeat Neo England`s Gentle Chapman who has won his fights through the use of unfair tactics.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ein starker Gegner! Chapmans heldenhafte Herausforderung
Kyouteki! Eiyuu Chapman no Chousen
Powerful Enemy! Chapman`s Heroic Challenge
Un héros pour adversaire ! Le défi de Chapman
強敵! 英雄チャップマンの挑戦

REGULAR.description:
Domon and Rain travel to Neo Egypt in order to face off against the Pharaoh Gundam XIII there. Upon arriving, they find out the Gundam and its crew have been destroyed by a "ghost".
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chair de poule ! Le Gundam Fighter fantôme
Kyoufu! Bourei Fighter Shutsugen
Terror! Der Phantom-Fighter erscheint
Terror! The Phantom Fighter Appears
恐怖! 亡霊ファイター出現

REGULAR.description:
In Neo Turkey Rain runs into an old friend, Saette Gyuzelle, from school. It is revealed that he is the Neo Turkey Gundam Fighter and he has been taken over by DG cells.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ame no Saikai... Falling Rain
Retrouvailles sous la pluie... Falling rain
Reunion in the Falling Rain
Wiedersehen im Regen
雨の再会... フォーリング・レイン

REGULAR.description:
Reports of the Devil Gundam surfacing in Shinjuku send Domon and Rain to Neo Japan. They run into an army of Death Army mobile suits controlled by the Devil Gundam and Domon tries to call his Shining Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Er ist der Ungeschlagene des Ostens! Master Asia hat seinen Auftritt
He`s the Undefeated of the East! Master Asia Appears
On l’appelle l’Invaincu d’Orient ! Master Asia entre en scène
Sono Na wa Touhou Fuhai! Master Asia Kenzan
その名は東方不敗! マスター・アジア見参

REGULAR.description:
Domon and Master Asia set out to search for survivors. Master leaves Domon alone and Domon is attacked by Chibodee Crocket, Argo Gulskii, Sai Saichi, and George de Sand.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Big Trouble! Domon vs. Big 5
Catastrophe ! Cinq Gundam à combattre
Dai Pinch! Teki wa 5 Dai Gundam
In der Klemme! Domon gegen die Big 5
大ピンチ! 敵は5大ガンダム

REGULAR.description:
Rain notices that there are four unidentified objects heading for Earth. She also notices that Master is going into an abandoned subway station. She follows him and loses him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Inconcevable ! La défaite du Shining Finger
Schock! Der Shining Finger ist besiegt
Shocking! Shining Finger Defeated!
Shougeki! Shining Finger Yaburetari
衝撃! シャイニング・フィンガー敗れたり

REGULAR.description:
A Death Army soldier comes to tell Domon that he is to meet with Master Asia alone at the Tokyo Tower. Domon goes, but along the way is stopped by his four friends.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das Wappen des Kriegers! Lebewohl, Shuffle-Allianz
La marque des guerriers ! Adieu, Alliance Shuffle
Senshi no Shougou! Saraba Shuffle Doumei
Warrior`s Crest--Goodbye, Shuffle Alliance
戦士の称号! さらばシャッフル同盟

REGULAR.description:
An earthquake shakes Shinjuku, and all the members of the Shuffle Alliance along with their crews are trapped underground. Rain stumbles upon the Devil Gundam, which is absorbing its Death Army mobile suits.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die ultimative Kraft und das ultimative Böse! Der Aufstieg des Devil Gundams
Saikyou Saiaku! Devil Gundam Arawaru
Surpuissant et démoniaque ! Le Devil Gundam sort de l’ombre
Ultimate Power and Evil! Rise of the Dark Gundam
最強最悪! デビルガンダム現わる

REGULAR.description:
Master Asia uses his knowledge of Domon and his reactions in order to lure Domon away from Shinjuku. While chasing what appears to be the Master Gundam, he is stopped by Schwarz who tries to persuade him to stop chasing after Master Asia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Challenge! Mysterious Masked Fighter
Confrontation ! Le Gundam Fighter masqué
Herausforderung! Der geheimnisvolle, maskierte Fighter
Taiketsu! Nazo no Fukumen Fighter
対決! 謎の覆面ファイター

REGULAR.description:
Chibodee`s pit crew notice how strange Chibodee has been acting lately, so they run off to the Guyana Highlands. Chibodee chases them, and in the process he finds Domon and begins to train with him.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Hissatsuwaza o Nusume! Bijo Gundan no Daisakusen
Steal the Secret! Scheme of the Beautiful Warriors
Stiehl das Geheimnis! Die Intrige der schönen Kriegerinnen
Sus à la botte secrète ! Le complot des belles
必殺技を盗め! 美女軍団の大作戦

REGULAR.description:
Domon and Rain are still training the Guyana Highlands. Rain is fixing the Shining Gundam while Domon continues his training.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Erbitterter Kampf! Dragon Gundam gegen Bolt Gundam
Fierce Battle! Dragon Gundam vs. Bolt Gundam
Gekitou! Dragon Gundam Tai Bolt Gundam
Un combat acharné ! Dragon Gundam contre Bolt Gundam
激闘! ドラゴンガンダム対ボルトガンダム

REGULAR.description:
Practicing with his butler, George is haunted by a massacre that occurred in the Neo France colony a year before. He was fighting a fellow candidate for the 13th Gundam Fight, Jean-Pierre Mirabeau, when the king refused to acknowledge Mirabeau as the winner due to his unfair tactics.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: George yo, Akumu o Uchikudake!
George, Beat the Nightmare!
George, Beat the Nightmare!
George, besiege den Albtraum!
ジョルジュよ, 悪夢を打ち砕け!

REGULAR.description:
With the finals only 3 days away, the four other members of the Shuffle Alliance wait for Domon to finish his training so they can leave for Neo Hong Kong, where the finals will take place.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Finalkampf steht an! Nur noch 3 Tage
Kesshou Semaru! Time Limit Mikka Mae
La phase finale approche ! Trois jours pour y parvenir
The Final Battle Approaches! Only 3 Days Away
決勝迫る! タイムリミット3日前

REGULAR.description:
Being attacked by several Gundam Heads the Shuffle Alliance and crew retreat. The Shuffle Alliance members decide to fight the Death Army in order to give Rain and Domon time to fix the Shining Gundam which was heavily damaged by Master Asia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Breakthrough! Warriors` Strong Ties
Durchbruch! Das starke Band zwischen den Kriegern
Le lien des guerriers ! Par-delà la toile du Devil Gundam
Senshi no Kizuna! Devil Houimou o Toppa Seyo
戦士の絆! デビル包囲網を突破せよ

REGULAR.description:
The other members of the Shuffle Alliance all escape the Guyana Highlands. Domon stays back to defeat Master Asia and the Devil Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Destined Battle! Domon vs. Dark Gundam
Le combat fatidique ! Domon contre le Devil Gundam
Schicksalskampf! Domon gegen den Devil Gundam
Shukumei no Tatakai! Domon Tai Devil Gundam
宿命の闘い! ドモン対デビルガンダム

REGULAR.description:
The four members of the Shuffle Alliance reach Neo Hong Kong for the finals, however Domon is not there. Still trapped in the Guyana Highlands, he spots a Neo Japan capsule containing the God Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Aratanaru Kagayaki! God Gundam Tanjou
Bright New Star! The Birth of the Burning Gundam
Strahlender, neuer Stern! Die Geburt des God Gundams
Une lumière nouvelle ! L’arrivée du God Gundam
新たなる輝き! ゴッドガンダム誕生

REGULAR.description:
Domon arrives in Neo Hong Kong moments before the deadline. The opening ceremonies start and Domon and the others are surprised to learn that Master Asia is back in his Master Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: All Fighters Gathered! The Final Battles Begin
Alle Gundam Fighters sind beisammen! Das Finale kann beginnen
Kesshou Kaimaku! Gundam Fighter Daishuugou
La phase finale commence ! La réunion des Gundam Fighters
決勝開幕! ガンダムファイター大集合

REGULAR.description:
The finals have started and Domon`s first opponent is Zeus Gundam, the favorite to win the championship. Domon is restless, so he goes through Neo Hong Kong looking for a place to stay.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A New Weapon! Erupting Burning Finger
Eine neue Waffe! Der ausbrechende God Finger!!
L’atout suprême ! Le foudroyant God Finger
Shin Hissatsuwaza! Bakunetsu God Finger!!
新必殺技! 爆熱ゴッド・フィンガー!!

REGULAR.description:
Domon is about to face off against Cobra Gundam of Neo India. The pilot of Cobra Gundam has no qualms about hurting Domon before the match.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Courage, Domon ! L’amitié est la clé de la victoire
Ganbare Domon! Tomo ni Sasageta Daishouri
Halte durch, Domon! Ein Triumph für das wiederhergestellte Vertrauen
Hang on, Domon! Triumph of the Restored Faith
頑張れドモン! 友に捧げた大勝利

REGULAR.description:
Schwarz Bruder fights the Viking Gundam, easily defeating it. Domon`s next opponent, Kyral Mekirel, is an assassin who has one all of his matches by default by killing his opponents before the matches.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dans la ligne de mire ! Le Gundam Fighter assassin
Domon Targeted! The Assassin`s Staff
Domon im Visier! Der Stab des Killers
Nerawareta Domon! Koroshiya Fighter no Hissatsu Ken
狙われたドモン! 殺し屋ファイターの必殺剣

REGULAR.description:
Sai Saici`s next opponent is the Mermaid Gundam. However he is distracted as he falls in love with the pilot`s sister, Cecil.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Durchgebrannt! Sai Saici ist verknallt
Défaite par forfait ? Le premier amour de Sai Saici
Running Away! Sai Saici in Love
Shiai Houki!? Koi ni Dokidoki, Sai Saici
試合放棄!? 恋にドキドキ, サイ・サイシー

REGULAR.description:
Domon is set to face off against Allenby Beardsely, a female Gundam Fighter who defeated Argo in under a minute. He meets her in an arcade and fights her in a fighting simulator, ending in a tie after the machine breaks down.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beautiful Fighter! Dangerous Allenby
Bishoujo Fighter! Dangerous Allenby
Schöne Fighterin! Gefährliche Allenby
Un Gundam Fighter de charme ! Dangerous Allenby
美少女ファイター! デンジャラス・アレンビー

REGULAR.description:
Chibodee lost his mother to a group of terrorist clowns and since then has been afraid of them. When his next opponent is Jester Gundam who copies everyone`s moves it looks like Chibodee will lose fairly quickly.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dazzling Power of the Clown! Get Mad, Gundam Maxter
Maudit soit le clown ! La colère du Gundam Maxter
Pierrot no Genwaku! Ikare Gundam Maxter
Überwältigende Kraft eines Clowns! Raste aus, Gundam Maxter
ピエロの幻惑! 怒れガンダムマックスター

REGULAR.description:
Michelo Chariot is Domon`s next opponent. Michelo and other fighters Domon has faced off with in the past set some traps to hurt Domon and the other Shuffle Alliance members.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dangerous Trap! Neros Gundam Strikes Back
Gefährliche Falle! Der Neros Gundam schlägt zurück
Kiken na Wana! Neros Gundam no Daigyakushuu
Un piège mortel ! La revanche du Neros Gundam
危険な罠! ネロスガンダムの大逆襲

REGULAR.description:
George`s next opponent is Gentle Chapman. Like Michelo Chariot, Chapman is under the influence of Master Asia and the Devil Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bote der Finsternis! Chapman erhebt sich erneut
Emissary of Darkness! Chapman Rises Again
Jigoku kara no Shisha! Chapman Fukkatsu
Le messager de l’enfer ! Chapman est de retour
地獄からの使者! チャップマン復活

REGULAR.description:
Schwarz Bruder goes to the Neo Hong Kong government building and sees the Devil Gundam in there healing. He is noticed by Master Asia, and he flees. He spots Rain following him and carries her to safety.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Relève-toi, Domon ! Le double duel de tous les dangers !
Stand Up Domon! Raging Tag Team Match
Steh auf, Domon! Der rasende Tag-Team-Kampf
Tate Domon! Arashi o Yobu Tag Match
立てドモン! 嵐を呼ぶタッグマッチ

REGULAR.description:
Now that the Devil Gundam is back, Domon requests the help of the Shuffle Alliance. However, they all refuse because the only person they want to fight is Domon.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kecchaku no Toki! Gounetsu Machine Gun Punch
Kräftemessen! Explosiver Machine Gun Punch
Le moment de vérité ! L’incandescent Mitrapoing
Showdown! Bursting Machinegun Punch
決着の時! 豪熱マシンガンパンチ

REGULAR.description:
George and Domon are set to fight each other, but the King of Neo France says there is no need, so he locks up Gundam Rose. However, George`s feelings are so strong he steals Gundam Rose and challenges Domon to a fight.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Knight`s Pride! Gundam Rose Stolen
Der Stolz eines Ritters! Der gestohlene Gundam Rose
Kishi no Hokori! Ubawareta Gundam Rose
L’honneur du chevalier ! On a volé le Gundam Rose
騎士の誇り! 奪われたガンダムローズ

REGULAR.description:
The day before he is to fight Domon, Sai Saici isn`t at all worried about the match. However after reading his father`s will he decides to win the Battle Royale to revive the Shaolin Temple which was one of his father`s wishes.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L’authentique Papillon météore ! Enflamme-toi, Dragon Gundam
Sai Saici`s New Attack! Blazing Dragon Gundam
Sai Saicis neuer Angriff! Flammender Dragon Gundam
Shin Ryuusei Kochouken! Moeyo Dragon Gundam
真・流星胡蝶剣! 燃えよドラゴンガンダム

REGULAR.description:
Andrew Graham of Neo Canada is facing off against Argo. Argo goes into Hyper Mode and uses a new technique, the Gaia Crusher, to create mountains in the ring.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Domon Tai Argo! Totsugeki Bolt Gundam
Domon contre Argo ! La charge du Bolt Gundam
Domon gegen Argo! Vorpreschender Bolt Gundam
Domon vs. Argo! Charging Bolt Gundam
ドモン対アルゴ! 突撃ボルトガンダム

REGULAR.description:
Domon goes looking for Allenby because she went missing. He yelled at Rain because she was supposed to look after Allenby. Fuun Saiki, Master Asia`s horse, comes and delivers Domon to Master Asia.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der ultimative Angriff! Das Duell gegen Master Asia
La Paume qui fend le ciel ! Duel contre Master Asia
Sekiha Tenkyouken! Kettou Master Asia
The Ultimate Attack! Duel with Master Asia
石破天驚拳! 決闘マスター・アジア

REGULAR.description:
Domon is set to fight against Schwarz to determine the overall winner of the individual matches. Prime Minister Wong has the ring rigged with 5,000 time bombs set to explode after 8 minutes just in case there is no winner determined by that time.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Ruthless Fight! Schwarz`s Last Match
Ein gnadenloser Kampf! Schwarz` letzter Kampf
Hijou no Death Match! Schwarz Saishuu Kessen
Un combat impitoyable ! Le dernier match de Schwarz
非情のデスマッチ! シュバルツ最終決戦

REGULAR.description:
Domon has Rain go scope out the situation with Schwarz/Kyoji while he goes to the Battle Royale. Rain sneaks in as a doctor and discovers that Schwarz is an android made up of DG cells. Rain`s father also finds out since he`s an expert in cybernetics.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Battle Royal Kaishi! Fukkatsu no Devil Gundam
Battle Royale Begins! Dark Gundam Revived
Das Battle Royale beginnt! Der Devil Gundam ist zurück
La mêlée générale commence ! La résurrection du Devil Gundam
バトルロイヤル開始! 復活のデビルガンダム

REGULAR.description:
With the help of Sai Saici and Argo, Domon defeats Michelo and heads for the next Heavenly King, Grand Gundam. Meanwhile at the hospital it is revealed the Devil Gundam was intended to restore the Earth.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Angriff der vier bösen Könige! Gundam Heaven`s Sword
Assault of the Four Evil Kings! Soaring Raven Gundam
Kyoushuu Shitennou! Gundam Heaven`s Sword
Les cavaliers de l’apocalypse ! Le Gundam Heaven’s Sword
強襲四天王! ガンダムヘブンズソード

REGULAR.description:
After Chibodee and George have defeated the Grand Gundam, Allenby appears and seems to be under the influence of the DG cells and Domon tries to reason with her.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bataille pour la suprématie ! À l’assaut du Grand Gundam
Königlicher Konter! Hinterhalt des Grand Gundams
Royal Counterattack! Ambush of the Grand Gundam
Shishiou Souha! Grand Gundam Geigeki Sakusen
獅王争覇! グランドガンダム迎撃作戦

REGULAR.description:
Rain manages to save Allenby by destroying the Walter Gundam. Schwarz and Kyoji sacrifice themselves so Domon can destroy the Devil Gundam`s cockpit, defeating it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Schwarz Chiru! Domon Namida no Hissatsu Ken
Schwarz Rests in Grace! Domon`s Tearful Attack
Schwarz est tombé ! Les larmes de Domon
Schwarz ruht in Frieden! Domons tränenreiche Attacke
シュバルツ散る! ドモン涙の必殺拳

REGULAR.description:
The final fight begins. Domon and Master Asia fight an extraordinary battle, and Domon convinces Master Asia`s plans would`ve failed anyway.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Adieu, maître ! Master Asia s’en va à l’aube
Farewell, Master! Master Asia`s Last Breath
Leb wohl, Meister! Master Asias letzter Atemzug
Saraba Shishou! Master Asia, Akatsuki ni Shisu
さらば師匠! マスター・アジア, 暁に死す

REGULAR.description:
Domon burns the Master Gundam and Master Asia`s body, proclaiming it to be the last time he will shed tears for Master Asia. The Devil Gundam needs a Core Life Unit that can produce life to function at its full potential.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Rain est en danger ! Le retour du Devil Gundam
Rain in der Klemme! Die Rückkehr des Devil Gundams
Rain no Kiki! Devil Gundam Futatabi
Rain`s Crisis! Return of the Dark Gundam
レインの危機! デビルガンダムふたたび

REGULAR.description:
Ulube now has the Devil Gundam at its full power, but though diabolical, he does not risk innocent lives, ordering an evacuation of the Neo Japan space colony.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Colonie Devil activée ! L’Alliance Shuffle à l’attaque
Dark Colony Activated! Attack of the Shuffle Alliance
Devil Colony Shidou! Daishingeki Shuffle Doumei
Die Devil Colony wurde aktiviert! Der Angriff der Shuffle-Allianz
デビルコロニー始動! 大進撃シャッフル同盟

REGULAR.description:
Domon`s father is now out of his cryogenic state and says that to beat the Devil Gundam Domon must destroy the colony`s power source. Gundams from around the world gather to defend the Earth from the Devil Gundam.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Chikyuu SOS! Shutsugeki Gundam Rengou!!
Earth`s S.O.S.! Gundam Federation Rescue
SOS Terre ! Les Gundam alliés décollent
SOS von der Erde! Rettungs-Gundam-Bündnis!!
地球SOS! 出撃ガンダム連合!!

REGULAR.description:
Thanks to the Devil Gundam`s self-recovery the Grand Master Gundam is resurrected and the Shuffle Alliance struggle to defeat it. The Devil Gundam Colony begins extending towards Earth, taking over most of it.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Burning Gundam`s Great Triumph! A Hopeful Future.. Ready, Go!
Der große Triumph des God Gundams! Eine hoffnungsvolle Zukunft!!
G(ゴッド)ガンダム大勝利! 希望の未来へレディ・ゴーッ!!
God Gundam Daishouri! Kibou no Mirai e Ready Go!!
Le triomphe du God Gundam ! En route vers l’avenir ! Prêts ? Partez !

Opening 1b
Opening 2
Ending 1
Ending 2
Kidou Butouden G Gundam
Mobile Fighter G Gundam
Mobile Fighter G Gundam
หุ่นนักสู้สะท้านปฐพี จี กันดั้ม
机动武斗传 G高达
機動武闘伝Gガンダム
g gundam
Gundam: Kidou Butouden G Gundam
